<br/>

**TwitchLink** is a user-friendly GUI tool for downloading Twitch streams, videos, and clips.
Enjoy fast and reliable downloads with powerful features to save your favorite moments and archive streams.

<br/>

<img alt="Preview" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/devhotteok/TwitchLink/main/.github/img/preview.png">

<br/>


## Homepage
- [TwitchLink Homepage][Homepage]
- For more information, visit this homepage.


## Features
- **Stream Downloads**
- **Video Downloads**
- **Clip Downloads**
- **Subscriber-Only Video Downloads**
- **Scheduled Downloads**
- **Thumbnail Downloads**
- **Audio-Only Downloads**
- **Video Unmuting**
- **Video Cropping**
- **Channel Bookmarks**
- **Customizable Filename Templates**
- **User-Friendly UI**
- **Language and Time Zone Settings**
- **Free and Open Source**


## System Requirements
Make sure your system meets the following requirements to run this project.

### Operating System
- **Windows**: Windows 10 or later
- **macOS**: macOS 14 (Sonoma) or later

### Python
- Python 3.12

### Dependencies
- All required Python packages are listed in the [requirements.txt][Requirements] file.
- You can install them by using the following command:
    ```shell
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    ```


## Installation
- [**TwitchLink** for Windows][Releases]
- [**TwitchLink** for macOS][Releases]

All contributions are greatly appreciated.
Please feel free to open a new issue or submit a pull request.
